contents.name: Row
contents.description: Row 1 is left front, 2 left rear, 3 right front, 4 right rear.

contents.name: TirePressureLow
contents.description: Tire Pressure Status. True = Low tire pressure. False = Good tire pressure.

contents.name: BreakFluidLevel
contents.description: Brake fluid level as percent. 0 = Empty. 100 = Full.

contents.name: BreakFluidLevelLow
contents.description: Brake fluid level status. True = Brake fluid level low. False = Brake fluid level OK.

contents.name: BreakPadWear
contents.description: Brake pad wear as percent. 0 = No Wear. 100 = Worn.

contents.name: BreakBrakesWorn
contents.description: Brake pad wear status. True = Worn. False = Not Worn.
